citations.narrative:
In the largest pen, to which most of the animals have permanent or intermittent access, there is a broken, plastic shelter
used by the smaller goats that has a sharp, pointed edge due to a broken portion of the vestibule. Animals can easily
come into contact with the broken part of the shelter.
In the "Yard" area which houses a single, adult kangaroo, there is a section of fencing that is patched with sheet metal
that has very sharp metal edges that could come into contact with the animal.
Inside the pen housing one adult female Patagonian cavy, there is a frayed tarp with holes torn in it, attached to an interior
fence.
Sharp edges and points pose an injury hazard for animals; torn items with holes can also lead to injury by entrapment.
The licensee must ensure that housing facilities are structurally sound and maintained in good repair to protect the
animals from injury and to contain the animals.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the zoo manager.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Repeat
   
Facilities, general. 
In the largest pen, to which most of the animals have permanent or intermittent access, there is a broken, plastic shelter 
used by the smaller goats that has a sharp, pointed edge due to a broken portion of the vestibule.  Animals can easily 
come into contact with the broken part of the shelter. 
In the "Yard" area which houses a single, adult kangaroo, there is a section of fencing that is patched with sheet metal 
that has very sharp metal edges that could come into contact with the animal. 
Inside the pen housing one adult female Patagonian cavy, there is a frayed tarp with holes torn in it, attached to an interior 
fence. 
Sharp edges and points pose an injury hazard for animals; torn items with holes can also lead to injury by entrapment.  
The licensee must ensure that housing facilities are structurally sound and maintained in good repair to protect the 
animals from injury and to contain the animals. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the zoo manager. 
 
 n
